name: useMediaQuery
description: Custom hook that tracks the state of a media query using the [`Match Media API`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Window/matchMedia).

props.name: options
props.description: The options for customizing the behavior of the hook (optional).

schema.name: defaultValue
schema.description: The default value to return if the hook is being run on the server.

schema.name: initializeWithValue
schema.description: If `true` (default), the hook will initialize reading the media query. In SSR, you should set it to `false`, returning `options.defaultValue` or `false` initially.
